channel.title: [PI] Zaryte Bow Help [PI]
channel.description: Hello There Moparians! I wanted u guys to help me out with something again. i recently added Zaryte bow to my rsps [PI] and i want it to shoot like a crystal bow. I have made the attack type like other ranged bow. and none of the arrows (bronze to dragon) work with it. I would like to add a projectile to it in other words. I heard that its in combat assistant. Any help appreciated thank you all alot. :P

item.title: [PI] Zaryte Bow Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

most likely it is in combatassistant

just search for either “crystalBow” or look for the itemID and do like a && wherever you see it if you wish to use the same method of range. You can then under gfxProjectiles you can add the projectile

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Zaryte Bow Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jitinder jitinder
item.description:
@jitinder wrote:

Hello There Moparians!
I wanted u guys to help me out with something again.
i recently added Zaryte bow to my rsps [PI]
and i want it to shoot like a crystal bow. I have made the attack type like other ranged bow.
and none of the arrows (bronze to dragon) work with it.
I would like to add a projectile to it in other words. I heard that its in combat assistant.
Any help appreciated
thank you all alot.

Read full topic
